segments.text: I can ’ t believe that Anthony is finally getting married !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah well it ’ s about time ! He ’ s been living with his parents for 40 years !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t be mean . Look here come the bridesmaids ! Their dresses look beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who are those kids walking down the aisle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s the flower girl and the ring bearer . I ’ m pretty sure they ’ re the groom ’ s niece and nephew.Oh , they look so cute !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just hope the priest makes it quick . I ’ m starving . I hope the food ’ s good at the reception .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s all you ever think about , food ! Oh , I think the bride ’ s coming now ! She looks gorgeous.Wait , what ’ s she doing ? Where ’ s she going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh great ! Does this mean that the reception is canceled ?
segments.speaker: S2
